Trainer_questionare.Course Overview: This course empowers educators with the knowledge and skills to integrate Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools into teaching practices, helping them enhance student learning and engagement.

Key Competency Areas: Understanding basic AI concepts relevant to education
Identifying and using AI tools for teaching
Recognizing ethical considerations of AI in the classroom

Learning Outcome Goals: Teachers should understand foundational AI concepts.
Teachers should explore practical applications of AI tools in educational settings.
Teachers should recognize the ethical considerations involved in using AI tools with students.

Known Pain Points or Challenges: Teachers may be unsure how to practically incorporate AI tools into lesson plans.
Teachers may have concerns about privacy and ethical implications of AI use in the classroom.

Trainer_questionare.Course Duration and Structure: 4 sessions over 2 weeks, each session lasting 1.5 hours.
